com.htsmart.wristband.bean.config

Class TurnWristLightingConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.htsmart.wristband.bean.config.TurnWristLightingConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BytesEnabled

    public class TurnWristLightingConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Kilnn on 2017/8/1. Turn over the wrist to bright screen. This is a new setting for instead of FunctionConfig.FLAG_TURN_WRIST_LIGHTING. If the WristbandVersion.isNewTurnWristLightingEnabled() is true.You should use TurnWristLightingConfig. Otherwise, you should use FunctionConfig.FLAG_TURN_WRIST_LIGHTING.
